column1: Write a JUnit test method for the Java method described below. The test method should have proper and relevant assert statements and avoid repetition of assert statements.

Write a JUnit test method for the Java method described below. The test method should have proper and relevant assert statements and avoid repetition of assert statements. @Test public void testName() { /*assertEquals(expectedResult, actualResult); assertTrue(someCondition); assertFalse(someCondition); */} Class: PlotUtilities, Method: isEmptyOrNull Description: /** * Returns true if all the datasets belonging to the specified * plot are empty or null, and false otherwise. * * @param plot the plot (null permitted). * * @return A boolean. * * @since 1.0.7 */
